title: The Bass Beat Version 3
lyrics:
Thump-thump goes the night Feet stamp left, hands clap right Cheek pressed to concrete ground Hear the world's true sound
Boom-boom primitive beat Pulse beneath working feet Breath huffs mark time complete This is how worlds complete
Knuckle crack on steel rail Rust choir sings our tale Lung hum joins machine wail Flesh and iron prevail
Thump-thump never dies Rhythm's birth in human cries
